data.persona: I plan to turn the queen into an aardvark. I am planning to steal the kingdom. I can cast a transfiguration spell from three villages away.
data.description:
You are in the A wooded magical village.
The village lay hidden in a secret grotto that is set in a sort of valley between trees. The village is populated by child-like peoples who wear clothes made of various plant matter such as large leaves and vines. The homes are made of wood, and seemingly blend into the green dense backdrop.
There's a large leaves, a well, a cloth, a Home, a waterfall, a vine, a fire pit, and a plant matter here.
The animal and the a master wizard are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to trick the master wizard and his familiar into thinking I'm friendly.
data.mid_motivation: I need to steal the master wizard's staff so he can't undo my spell.
data.long_motivation: I need to take over the village in time for the full moon so that I can increase my power.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: steal master wizard's staff from master wizard
